resources.string: Always display LTE/4G even when LTE+/4G+ is available
Replace voice assist shortcut on the lockscreen with phone shortcut
Remove icon from the status bar and next alarm from the lockscreen and the quick settings
When in landscape, always display the navigation bar on the right
Always enable dark theme even on light wallpapers
Remove the notification when USB debugging is enabled
Remove icon from the status bar and notification from the quick settings
Remove \"Network may be monitored\" from the quick settings
Remove build version from the quick settings when developer options are enabled
